steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 201 response
When I login with the following credentials:
And I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/login/"
Then I get a 200 response

scenarios.name: Login as a registered user with right credentials

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 201 response
When I login with the following credentials:
And I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/login/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"non_field_errors":["Unable to log in with provided credentials."]}":

scenarios.name: Login as a registered user with wrong credentials

steps.name: Given I login with the following credentials:
And I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/login/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"non_field_errors":["Unable to log in with provided credentials."]}":
Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 201 response
Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"email":["Enter a valid email address."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user with invalid email

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{ "email": ["This field may not be blank." ]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user with no email

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"username": ["Ensure this field has at least 5 characters."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user with username less than 5 characters

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"username":["Ensure this field has no more than 15 characters."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user with username more than 15 characters

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"non_field_errors":["The two password fields didn't match."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user when different password is entered in the password 2 field

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"password1":["This field may not be blank."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user when password1 field is empty

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"password2":["This field may not be blank."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user when password2 field is empty

steps.name: Given I have the following unregistered user with given information:
When I send a POST request to "/rest-auth/registration/"
Then I get a 400 response
And the response should be JSON "{"password1":["This password is too short. It must contain at least 8 characters."]}":

scenarios.name: Register new user when password is less than 8 characters short
